snippet: In President Hamid Karzai’s demand on Thursday, he said that his government had evidence that Afghan law and prisoners’ human rights were being violated.
abstract: President Hamid Karzai of Afghanistan abruptly demands that the American-led coalition hand over all Afghan prisoners in its custody and cede control of its main prison in the country within a month, saying that his government has evidence that Afghan law and prisoners’ human rights have been violated at the prison.
lead_paragraph: In President Hamid Karzai’s demand on Thursday, he said that his government had evidence that Afghan law and prisoners’ human rights were being violated.

headline.seo: Karzai Calls for Coalition to Cede Control of Afghan Prisoners
headline.main: Karzai Calls for Coalition to Cede Control of Afghan Prisoners
headline.print_headline: Karzai Calls for Coalition to Cede Control of Afghan Prisoners

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
